price: Dileseydik, gözlerini tamamen kör ederdik de, o zaman doğru yolu bulmaya koşuşurlardı. Oysa nasıl görebilirler?
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَبَقُواْ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu laṭamasnā ʿalā aʿyunihim fa-is'tabaqū al-ṣirāṭa fa-annā yub'ṣirūna
